mapper.sql: id, currency_code, currency_name, status, create_user, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT ci.`currency_name` currencyName, ci.`currency_code` currencyCode, t1.exchange_rate exchangeRate FROM currency_info ci LEFT JOIN currency_rate t1 ON ci.`id` = t1.`ocid` AND t1.dcid = ( SELECT t.id FROM currency_info t WHERE t.currency_code = 'CNY' ) WHERE ci.`status` = 1 AND t1.`status` = 1 and t1.`month` = #{createdTimeStr}
